name: crud-clubs
description: crud app splitted in front end and back ends servers, NextJs serves frontend with react UX while NestJs serves RESTfull endpoints for reading and modifying user data

scripts.devLinux: gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c "cd frontEnd && npm run dev" & gnome-terminal --tab -- bash -c "cd backEnd && npm run dev"
scripts.devWindows: start cmd /k "cd frontEnd && npm run dev" & start cmd /k "cd backEnd && npm run dev"

author: Timothy Burton
